r.d: This is the MySQLi MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- fixed bug #12117: disconnect() does not work as documented - fixed bug #13412: sometimes getTableConstraintDefinition() fails for FOREIGN KEYs - fixed bug #13581: wrong query in beginTransaction() for certain MySQL versions - fixed bug #13928: Invalid triggers created for 'ON UPDATE' - fixed bug #15051: Cannot create constraints with field length - add index on FK column(s) or a FK constraint cannot be created in some cases
open todo items: - use a trigger to emulate setting default now()
